string-array.name: tips_array
string-array.item: You are severely underweight. It is a sign that you\'re not eating enough or you may be ill.
Because you are underweight, you may need to gain weight.
For your height, you are at a healthy weight. You reduce your chances of having significant health issues.
You have a small weight problem. For health reasons, you may be advised to lose weight.
You are heavily overweight. Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight.
